user_stories.title: AI Video Generation
user_stories.story: As a video producer, I want AI-powered video generation that can create short-form content from text descriptions so that I can quickly produce engaging videos for social media and marketing campaigns.
acceptance_criteria: Generate videos from text prompts and scripts
Support multiple video styles and formats
Include background music and sound effects
Export in multiple resolutions and formats
Provide batch generation for multiple variations

user_stories.title: Automated Video Editing
user_stories.story: As a video editor, I want automated editing tools that can trim, splice, and enhance video content so that I can focus on creative decisions rather than repetitive tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Automatically detect and remove silent segments

user_stories.title: Content Repurposing
user_stories.story: As a content manager, I want automated content repurposing that can transform long-form videos into multiple short-form pieces for different platforms so that I can maximize content reach and engagement.

user_stories.title: Live Stream Enhancement
user_stories.story: As a streamer, I want live stream enhancement tools that can add overlays, alerts, and interactive elements so that I can create engaging live content with minimal setup.

user_stories.title: Video Analytics and Optimization
user_stories.story: As a marketing manager, I want video analytics that can track engagement, identify optimal posting times, and suggest content improvements so that I can maximize video performance.
